name: Flushed Bats
description:
Using tilt controls, move Ey-Beetee to eradicate the invading data-breaching bats, each in a small timeframe. Save your phone!

But your phone seems to suffer from a leak; sometimes the screen gets filled by water. Luckily, Ey-Beetee knows how to swim.


This is the latest version, with added features not included in the Google Play release. Google didn't approve my last update since 'Ads weren't directed to minors'.

1.3 includes spike skins, wich are unlocked alongside the normal player skins.

This is the first ever game I finished and published. So far it's the most polished game I've ever made. Please be kind with your feedback and have fun!
